message: Just bought my early bird ticket, but before booking a room - wondered if there was a place people are coordinating room shares?  If not, maybe this topic can be a place.
One sharing done!
I'm looking  for a female roomate. I haven't booked yet, but I don't mind doing that.
@vixter55 I have a free bed in my room :)
I'm looking for a female roomate too! me too!! :-D
Get serious, guys - no harassment; RESPECT.  We have Zero tolerance for this.  This is for room sharing for the conference.

OK - Let's take this off of public space:   If you want to share a room for Djangocon US 2011, request to be added to this private group: https://convore.com/djangocon-2011-room-sharing/room-sharing-requests/
If someone is comfortable enough with this, they're certainly free to use it.

Yarkot - One person, Kronuz, said something idiotic and out of place. The others were women talking to each other. Why are you creating a private room because ONE PERSON said something boneheaded? Instead, call him out.
kcunning - Katie; right.   Still, this is viewable by the world, so private is, er, private - seems appropriate enough for seeking housing arrangements.
I recommend going to the private group to, um... stay a little more private.
If not for @yarkot and @pydanny's comments, I might have thought @Kronuz was a female with her hair tied back

is there any room sharing django app in the wild?
if not I will write it
@kt1000 there is none that I am aware of, historically we've just used IRC, mailing lists, and wiki pages (last of which should be up on the djangocon.us site shortly)
Looking to share a room for djangocon, will arrive on the 4th and stay until the 9th, I have no problem with overlapping dates (i.e. will pay for extra days on my own where necessary)
@k1000 if you'd like to write something we'd be happy to promote it, but we can probably survive without one if not :)

thanx @SeanOC 
looks that is dosn't exist. I'll try to make it generic so it can be used in different circumstances. I will let You know when I have something.
This group worked.  I got a room share.  See you @ DjangoCon.
Red Lion Portland Convention Center (3 star), 9/4-9/10, will share with 1 non-smoker, contact me at taavi@taijala.com. Your share of the room: $200.
@vixter55 Glad it worked for you!

Ah. @TheOpenBastion followers, please take time to assess Convore's usefulness to you as conference goers. Please take a look at some of the other threads you find around you related to earlier conferences. Convore really can be useful. Feel free to start discussions!
@k1000 So how's the app coming?
@taavi223 Your hotel is in the Free Rail Zone so you can get to the conference for free using Max. Another Portland win!
Is any one looking to share a room for DjangoCon?  I am planning to stay there from 4th to 9th? you can ping me at ddehghan @ gmail.com. See you all at DjangoCon :-)
